metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20149 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ctorName in index.js in kind-of v6.0.2 allows external user input to overwrite certain internal attributes via a conflicting name, as demonstrated by 'constructor': {'name':'Symbol'}. Hence, a crafted payload can overwrite this builtin attribute to manipulate the type detection result.

criterions.comment: node-kind-of: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
